ExampleDefinition.Title: Stacked Bar Chart
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows how to create stacked bar chart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a Stacked Bar chart in code-behind. The [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.StackedColumnRenderableSeries.html']StackedColumnRenderableSeries API[/url] can be used to render columns stacked one above another, side by side, or a Left or Right aligned Bar Chart.
The rotation of the chart is achieved by setting the XAxis [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.Axes.AxisBase~AxisAlignment.html']AxisAlignment[/url] on the Left, and YAxis.AxisAlignment on the Bottom.
Columns are rendered using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseRenderableSeries~Stroke.html']Stroke[/url] (outline) and [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseColumnRenderableSeries~Fill.html']Fill[/url] (fill).
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
Do you need to change the width of the column? Try setting [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseColumnRenderableSeries~DataPointWidth.html']DataPointWidth[/url] from 0.0 to 1.0. This alters how much space the column takes up. Also the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.BaseColumnRenderableSeries~UseUniformWidth.html']UseUniformWidth[/url] property may be used to define whether column widths are uniform or not
